name: Debugger
description:
Get all the bugs out of your code! Load your own source code and catch them all.

********************************************************* .----. .----..----. .-. .-. .---. .---. .----..----. | {} \| {_ | {} }| { } |/ __}/ __}| {_ | {} } | /| {__ | {} }| {_} |\ {_ }\ {_ }| {__ | .-. \ `----' `----'`----' `-----' `---' `---' `----'`-' `-' ********************************************************* v.1.0 BLUE bugs are cosmetic - can hurt just you YELLOW bugs are major - can damage your code RED bugs are critical - creates new bugs Your code health must not fall below 33%! Click on NEW CAMPAIGN to select the folder of your project Bugs can also drop the bonus. Red for extra health, blue for shield, yellow for super fire rate and black is bomb, that destroys everything around! DEBUG!

Supported file extensions: *.cs,*.java,*.c,*.cpp,*.cxx,*.pas,*.php,*.py,*.rb,*.fs,*.bas (other can be easily moded).

Game by Petr Kubíček aka KUBI Games. © 2018 All rights reserved.

Music by Mark Sparling - https://soundcloud.com/marksparling
